revised_title: Effects of Mixture of Farina of Apple-Trees and Mayze on Plant and Human Health
tldr: The author, Benj Cooke, discusses the effects of mixing farina of apple-trees and mayze on plants and humans. He observes the impact of cross-pollination on plant colors and describes a case where a husband's jaundice was passed on to his child, but not to the next child born after the mother recovered from the same illness.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Genetics and Plant Breeding
